short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize & Search your ChatGPT chats. Color coded folders for better organization.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Organize Your Chats Efficiently. Easily create custom folders to categorize your ChatGpt conversations. Whether it's work, personal, educational, or any other category, ChatGpt Folders makes it simple to keep your chats organized.

***NB****: Existing users as of May 3, 2024 - ChatGpt has migrated their domain to chatgpt.com. A new version of the extension (v 1.7.6) was released to work with this. Update the extension so it can work on this new domain. You may also have to re-enable the extension because request to work on the new domain is seen as a new permission. You can go to: "chrome://extensions/" in your chrome browser to re-enable

**Updates**
Nov 28 - bug fix
Aug 28 - Fixed bug after UI update
Jun 30 - Added edit folder (finally)
Jun 25 - ui improvements
June 22 - Fixed issue where all of history is not shown. chats already in a folder will be in another color instead of being removed
May 21 - Fixed critical bug

**This extension is not associated with ChatGPT in anyway**

If you have many chats, you want a way to organize them, and this is a tool made just for you to do that.

- Install the Extension: Add ChatGpt Folders to your Chrome browser with just a click.
- Create Folders: Start by creating your first folder and customize it according to your needs.
- Organize Chats: Click the Add to Folder button in a chat to put it into a created folder
- Enjoy: Organized chats.

Please note, the extension will not affect the chats created by you. For example, if you remove a chat from a folder, it is not removed from ChatGPT itself. The chat will still be accessible.
All your data is stored on your device. This extension does not transmit anything over the internet.

We believe in continuous improvement and value your feedback. If you have suggestions, questions, or need support, reach out to us at admin@wimeki.com.
